content: PROCEDURE:​​​Seller will need SPA filed, Signed and SubmittedZoom call will be arranged to do POF and Satoshi.​BUYER AND SELLER WILL AGREE TO TERMS OF TRANSACTION AND PROCEDURES BY SIGNING THIS AGREEMENT.ONCE BUYER AND SELLER AGREE ON DETAILS OF THE TRANSACTION THEN BOTH PARTIES SHALL BE READY TO PERFORM AND BUYER IMMEDIATELY TRANSFER UP TO XXX USD TO SELLER FOR BITCOIN TO THE BANK ACCOUNT ON THIS AGREEMENT, THEN SELLER WILL TRANSFER EQUIVALENT BITCOIN TO BUYERS WALLET ADDRESS. ANY OVERAGES IN FUNDS WILL ROLL AND EXTEND TO THE NEXT TRANCHE.AFTER THE SUCCESS OF THE FIRST TEST TRANCHE, THEN BUYER AND SELLER WILL CONTINUE TO TRANCHE UNTIL THE EXHAUSTION OF THE CONTRACT.SELLER DISTRIBUTES ALL BROKERS COMMISSIONS.  WHATSAPP: @MADM0026
